text: Our Lord grant us what You have promised us through the tongues of Your messengers in the way of mercy and favour they are asking Him that they be made among those that deserve such a promise for God’s promise is fufilled regardless but they are not certain that they are among those who deserve it. The repetition of the phrase our Lord is out of extreme humility; and abase us not on the Day of Resurrection. You will not fail the tryst’ the promise of Resurrection and Requital.
